text: Clássica Loulé is a men's one-day cycle race which takes place in Portugal. It was rated by the UCI as 1.2http://www.procyclingstats.com/race/Classica_Internacional_Loule_Capital_Europeia_do_Desporto_2015 and forms part of the UCI Europe Tour.http://www.procyclingstats.com/races.php?c=1&year;=2014&circuit;=13 ==Overall winners== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%" width=40% ! title: Clássica Loulé
